Comments.Message:
Merge from Work Item # 15047  

In the file 
PHPExcel/Style/NumberFormat.php

you've forgotten a classical number format: 'dd/mm/yyyy'
So I have to set it by hand like this, and it's not really clean code:

$active_sheet->getStyle($col.$lig)->getNumberFormat()->setFormatCode('dd/mm/yyyy');
